name: Gamified Habit Tracker
description: Gamified Habit Tracker — Turn Habits into XP. Level Up Your Life. The one and only Notion Featured Gamified Habit Tracker, now with more than 10,000 satisfied customers.The Gamified Habit Tracker is a Notion Featured template that reimagines habit tracking into something fun, motivating, and effortless. Instead of checkboxes or rigid systems, you’ll use buttons to track habits and earn EXP, turning self-improvement into a rewarding game. Track with a single tap, rack up EXP, and watch your progr
features: Button-Based Habit Tracking: Simple tapping or clicking to record your habits, maximum freedom, and minimum complexity. Optimized for mobile.; 20 Built-in Habits: Easily add, remove, and customize your habits and EXP earn.; Simple and Modern Dashboard: Includes a beautifully designed calendar, giving you a quick and easy look at your habit progress per week and month, as well as EXP earned.
